    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentSamplingRate

        java.util.Map<eu.smartcampus.util.DatapointAddress,eu.smartcampus.util.SamplingRate> getCurrentSamplingRate(eu.smartcampus.util.Sensor sensor,
                                                                                                          java.util.List<eu.smartcampus.util.DatapointAddress> datapoints)
        Gets an array with the corresponding sampling rate for the datapoints of a given sensor.
        Parameters:
        sensor - the sensor to which belong the datapoints
        datapoints - the list of datapoints for which we want to know the sampling rate
        Returns:
        the sampling rate for the corresponding datapoint
